segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children near the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly-looking two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a cookie jar, with one hand already inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry he might fall and hurt himself quite badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing beside him, clearly a willing accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, ready to receive her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on those cookies, seemingly oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this many times before without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, but the risk here is very real.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors frame them, almost like a stage for their act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the tipping stool right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
